    index="index",
    query={
        "script_score": {
            "query": {
                "match": {
                    "body": "elasticsearch"
                }
            },
            "script": {
                "source": "_score * saturation(doc['pagerank'].value, 10)"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
